name: Final Fantasy Legacy
description:
A woman escaping the clutches of the church for acquiring knowledge that is forbidden.

A boy looking for his half sister's parents ... and his own ...

An honorable soldier who has to betray everything he believes in for the honor of his family and the justice of the church he serves ...

Welcome to the world of Final Fantasy Legacy, based on a multi-writer fanfic started by Brian Stricklin, where the fate of young people, Mystic Academy students, church servants, and soldiers, are intertwined with the mission of the unknown enemy acting in the shadows.

You play as Davin, a Mystic Academy student visiting his sister in his hometown of Tienne when the unexpected happens and his destiny becomes intertwined with Marcine, an ex-priestess of the Church of Tienne now turn fugitive for breaking a taboo.

This game only features the first chapter. I developed it with the intention of wasting time doing something productive instead of watching garbage on Netflix during the pandemic era (Guess we are still on this era). I might come back to it later but for now it is complete.

Completion time should be about 15 to 30 minutes.

Enjoy!

Available for Windows, Mac and Web browser at https://final-fantasy-legacy.web.app


Github page. Just hit "Code" (the green button) and then download zip.
